StratmasClient.object
Class Circle

java.lang.Object
  StratmasClient.object.StratmasObject
      StratmasClient.object.Shape
          StratmasClient.object.SimpleShape
              StratmasClient.object.Circle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transferable
public class Circle
extends SimpleShape

A circle defines a set of two dimensional points contained by a scalars reach from a twodimensional point.

getAddActionGroupForListDec

protected static ActionGroup getAddActionGroupForListDec(StratmasList listToAddTo,
                                                         Declaration declaration)
Convenience method for creating the ActionGroup for adding elements to a list. Goes through the descendant types of the type of this list and groups actions according to that.

Parameters:
listToAddTo - The StratmasList that the elements should be added to.
declaration - The Declaration of the StratmasList to create add actions for. May be the Declaration of the StratmasList to add to or in recursive calls a Declaration with a type that is a descendant to the type of the list.
Returns:
An ActionGroup with all the add actions that applies to this list grouped by type.
